attributes.action: Immediately stop anybody who is not a serving elected individual using taxpayer funded accommodation in foreign countries.
attributes.additional_details: It has been divulged that the taxpayer is helping Tony Blair, among others, with their self enrichment by providing high class accommodation FREE OF CHARGE in overseas locations while they are carrying out private functions and activities which have absolutely nothing to do with promoting the people nor the country, BUT FOR WHICH THEY RECEIVE HUGE TAX FREE FEES.  IF THESE PROVISIONS ARE NOT TO BE EXTENDED TO EVERY SINGLE TAXPAYER WHEN ANY OF THEM VISITS A FOREIGN COUNTRY THEN THEY MUST BE BANNED FROM BEING PROVIDED FOR ANYBODY WHO USED TO BE AN ELECTED PERSON!
